column5: INSY Insys said it was likely that investors will lose all or a part of their investments if the company is not able to sell its assets at the value they are booked in its audited financial statements It may be necessary for the company to file a voluntary petition for relief under Chapter 11 of the United States Bankruptcy Code in order to implement a restructuring Therefore trading in our securities is highly speculative the company said in a statementbingcomampsmobilereute
TXMD Well he didnt another lie INSY ceo bought more stock a few months b4 announcing BK

INSY does not look pretty but if this stays and closes above 090 would be a positive move Very frustrating that no one from the company giving statements I hope this steers away from where it is today and one day we can get back to 1011 I know many including myself have lost so much in this POS that the management needs to get their shit together and pull it together I am not sure why they have to pay for the court costs and why they decided to go in bribery I would not have invested in them if there was a chance they are being shady

INSY i think no matter what stock you are holding looks like we are fucked for long time Brace yourself Hold on tight and hopefully we be ok in 6 months to one year I think we are in dire need of change with our country It is a shame our country is so divided and we can not get along no matter what Really hope INSY gets their shit together and reward the shareholders and not fuck them
INSY shares are worth zero when the company mentions BK
